plot: When life-long friends, Andy and Greg, are imprisoned by an unknown captor in the middle of the night, they soon suspect that the key to their freedom is buried somewhere in their past.
title: Without Fear
plot_es: When life-long friends, Andy and Greg, are imprisoned by an unknown captor in the middle of the night, they soon suspect that the key to their freedom is buried somewhere in their past.
plot_en: When life-long friends, Andy and Greg, are imprisoned by an unknown captor in the middle of the night, they soon suspect that the key to their freedom is buried somewhere in their past.
